statement.p: The right circular conical tank shown has height 4.00 m and top radius \displaystyle{1.40} m. It is filled with water to a height of \displaystyle{3.50} m. The cross section is a right triangle with height 4.00 m and top side \displaystyle{1.40} m. Inside is another right triangle with height \displaystyle{3.50} m.
What is the volume of water? m
How much water must be added to fill the tank? \displaystyle\text{m}^{{3}}
